40 
41 bool deleteGroup(pses_ucbridge::DeleteGroup::Request& req,
42  pses_ucbridge::DeleteGroup::Response& res, Communication* com)
43 {
44  res.was_set = false;
45  std::string cmd = "Delete Group";
46  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
47  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
48  input.insertParameter("grp_nr", "uint8_t", req.group_number);
49  try{
50  res.was_set = com->sendCommand(cmd, input, output);
51  }catch(std::exception& e){
52  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Service 'Delete Group' occured!\n Description: "<<e.what());
53  res.was_set = false;
54  return false;
55  }
56  return true;
57 }

59 bool getControllerID(pses_ucbridge::GetControllerID::Request& req,
60  pses_ucbridge::GetControllerID::Response& res, Communication* com)
61 {
62  res.answer_received = false;
63  std::string cmd = "Get Controller ID";
64  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
65  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
66  try{
67  res.answer_received = com->sendCommand(cmd, input, output);
68  if(!res.answer_received) return false;
69  output.getParameterValue("ID",res.ID);
70  }catch(std::exception& e){
71  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Service 'Get Controller ID' occured!\n Description: "<<e.what());
72  res.answer_received = false;
73  return false;
74  }
75  return true;
76 }

233 bool getMotorLevel(pses_ucbridge::GetMotorLevel::Request& req,
234  pses_ucbridge::GetMotorLevel::Response& res, Communication* com)
235 {
236  res.answer_received = false;
237  std::string cmd = "Get Motor Level";
238  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
239  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
240  try{
241  res.answer_received = com->sendCommand(cmd, input, output);
242  if(!res.answer_received) return false;
243  std::string direction;
244  short level;
245  output.getParameterValue("direction",direction);
246  output.getParameterValue("level",level);
247  if(direction.compare("F")!=0){
248  level=-level;
249  }
250  res.level=level;
251  }catch(std::exception& e){
252  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Service 'Get Motor Level' occured!\n Description: "<<e.what());
253  res.answer_received = false;
254  return false;
255  }
256  return true;
257 }

351 bool setIMU(pses_ucbridge::SetIMU::Request& req,
352  pses_ucbridge::SetIMU::Response& res, Communication* com)
353 {
354  res.was_set = false;
355  std::string cmd = "Set IMU";
356  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
357  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
358  input.insertParameter("arange", "int16_t", req.accel_range);
359  input.insertParameter("afilt", "int16_t", req.accel_filter);
360  input.insertParameter("grange", "int16_t", req.gyro_range);
361  input.insertParameter("gfilt", "int16_t", req.gyro_filter);
362  std::vector<std::string>options;
363  options.push_back("IMU_AccelRange");
364  options.push_back("IMU_AccelFilter");
365  options.push_back("IMU_GyroRange");
366  options.push_back("IMU_GyroFilter");
367  options.push_back("IMU_si_info");
368  try{
369  res.was_set = com->sendCommand(cmd, options, input, output);
370  output.getParameterValue("info", res.in_si_units);
371  }catch(std::exception& e){
372  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Service 'Set IMU' occured!\n Description: "<<e.what());
373  res.was_set = false;
374  return false;
375  }
376  return true;
377 }
378 
379 bool setMag(pses_ucbridge::SetMag::Request& req,
380  pses_ucbridge::SetMag::Response& res, Communication* com)
381 {
382  res.was_set = false;
383  std::string cmd = "Set MAG";
384  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
385  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
386  unsigned char use_asa = req.use_asa;
387  input.insertParameter("use_asa", "uint8_t", use_asa);
388  std::vector<std::string>options;
389  options.push_back("MAG_USEASA");
390  try{
391  res.was_set = com->sendCommand(cmd, options, input, output);
392  }catch(std::exception& e){
393  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Service 'Set IMU' occured!\n Description: "<<e.what());
394  res.was_set = false;
395  return false;
396  }
397  return true;
398 }
399 
400 bool setMotorLevel(pses_ucbridge::SetMotorLevel::Request& req,
401  pses_ucbridge::SetMotorLevel::Response& res, Communication* com)
402 {
403  res.was_set = false;
404  std::string cmd = "Drive Forward";
405  short level = req.level;
406  if (req.level < 0)
407  {
408  cmd = "Drive Backward";
409  level = -req.level;
410  }
411 
412  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
413  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
414  input.insertParameter("speed", "int16_t", level);
415  try{
416  res.was_set = com->sendCommand(cmd, input, output);
417  }catch(std::exception& e){
418  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Service 'Set Motor Level' occured!\n Description: "<<e.what());
419  res.was_set = false;
420  return false;
421  }
422  return true;
423 }

461 bool setUS(pses_ucbridge::SetUS::Request& req,
462  pses_ucbridge::SetUS::Response& res, Communication* com)
463 {
464  res.was_set = false;
465  std::string cmd = "Set US";
466  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
467  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
468  input.insertParameter("usrange", "int16_t", req.range);
469  input.insertParameter("usgain", "int16_t", req.gain);
470  std::vector<std::string>options;
471  options.push_back("US_Range");
472  options.push_back("US_Gain");
473  options.push_back("US_si_info");
474  try{
475  res.was_set = com->sendCommand(cmd, options, input, output);
476  output.getParameterValue("info", res.in_si_units);
477  }catch(std::exception& e){

479  res.was_set = false;

485 bool toggleBrakes(pses_ucbridge::ToggleBrakes::Request& req,
486  pses_ucbridge::ToggleBrakes::Response& res, Communication* com)
487 {
488  res.was_set = false;
489  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
490  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
491  std::string cmd;
492  if(req.brakes_on){
493  cmd = "Full Stop";
494  }else{
495  cmd = "Drive Forward";
496  short level = 0;
497  input.insertParameter("speed", "int16_t", level);
498  }
499  try{
500  res.was_set = com->sendCommand(cmd, input, output);
501  }catch(std::exception& e){
502  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Service 'Toggle Brakes' occured!\n Description: "<<e.what());
503  res.was_set = false;
504  return false;
505  }
506  return true;
507 }

509 bool toggleDAQ(pses_ucbridge::ToggleDAQ::Request& req,
510  pses_ucbridge::ToggleDAQ::Response& res, Communication* com)
511 {
512  res.was_set = false;
513  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
514  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
515  std::string cmd;
516  if(req.DAQ_on){
517  cmd = "Start DAQ";
518  }else{
519  cmd = "Stop DAQ";
520  }
521  try{
522  res.was_set = com->sendCommand(cmd, input, output);
523  }catch(std::exception& e){
524  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Service 'Toggle DAQ' occured!\n Description: "<<e.what());
525  res.was_set = false;
526  return false;
527  }
528  return true;
529 }

532 bool toggleDMS(pses_ucbridge::ToggleDMS::Request& req,
533  pses_ucbridge::ToggleDMS::Response& res, Communication* com)
534 {
535  res.was_set = false;
536  std::string cmd = "Set Drv";
537  unsigned int interval = 0;
538  if (req.dms_on)
539  {
540  interval = req.dms_interval;
541  }
542 
543  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
544  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
545  std::vector<std::string> options;
546  options.push_back("DMS_Interval");
547  input.insertParameter("dms_time", "uint32_t", interval);
548  try{
549  res.was_set = com->sendCommand(cmd, options, input, output);
550  }catch(std::exception& e){
551  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Service 'toggleDMS' occured!\n Description: "<<e.what());
552  res.was_set = false;
553  return false;
554  }
555  return true;
556 }

558 bool toggleGroup(pses_ucbridge::ToggleGroup::Request& req,
559  pses_ucbridge::ToggleGroup::Response& res, Communication* com)
560 {
561  res.was_set = false;
562  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
563  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
564  std::string cmd;
565  if(req.group_on){
566  cmd = "Activate Group";
567  }else{
568  cmd = "Deactivate Group";
569  }
570  input.insertParameter("grp_nr", "uint8_t", req.group_number);
571  try{
572  res.was_set = com->sendCommand(cmd, input, output);
573  }catch(std::exception& e){
574  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Service 'Toggle Group' occured!\n Description: "<<e.what());
575  res.was_set = false;
576  return false;
577  }
578  return true;
579 }

604 bool toggleMotor(pses_ucbridge::ToggleMotor::Request& req,
605  pses_ucbridge::ToggleMotor::Response& res, Communication* com)
606 {
607  res.was_set = false;
608  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
609  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
610  std::string cmd;
611  if(req.motor_on){
612  cmd = "Drive Forward";
613  short level = 0;
614  input.insertParameter("speed", "int16_t", level);
615  }else{
616  cmd = "Motor Off";
617  }
618  try{
619  res.was_set = com->sendCommand(cmd, input, output);
620  }catch(std::exception& e){
621  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Service 'Toggle Motor' occured!\n Description: "<<e.what());
622  res.was_set = false;
623  return false;
624  }
625  return true;
626 }

628 bool toggleUS(pses_ucbridge::ToggleUS::Request& req,
629  pses_ucbridge::ToggleUS::Response& res, Communication* com)
630 {
631  res.was_set = false;
632  Parameter::ParameterMap input;
633  Parameter::ParameterMap output;
634  std::string cmd;
635  if(req.us_on){
636  cmd = "Toggle US On";
637  }else{
638  cmd = "Toggle US Off";
639  }
640 
641  try{
642  res.was_set = com->sendCommand(cmd, input, output);
643  }catch(std::exception& e){
644  ROS_WARN_STREAM("An error in Service 'Toggle US' occured!\n Description: "<<e.what());
645  res.was_set = false;
646  return false;
647  }
648  return true;
649 }
650 
651 }
652 #endif // SERVICEFUNCTIONS_H
